name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full Picture: research, analyze with ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read faster, understand better, research deeper: use ChatGPT to summarize, explain, check bias and get insights on news and articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full Picture is a browser extension that uses OpenAI's GPT-3 technology to help you evaluate the text you are reading and make informed decisions about it. It allows you to quickly and easily see the various angles of any text, article, or news item you come across. It is designed to equip you with the tools you need to assess the credibility and accuracy of the information they are consuming.

First, it helps you to understand the text by quickly summarizing it in easy-to-understand three bullet points. After that, it analyzes the text looking for unsupported claims, biases, imbalanced reporting, potential risks and underrepresented points of view. It also assigns a general rating on how reliable the text is. This allows you to quickly assess the quality and reliability of every text you are reading.

Finally, Full Picture provides six search keywords that can be used in Google to find information that the article is missing or misrepresents. This helps you gain a more in-depth understanding of the text you are reading.

Full Picture is powered by OpenAI's GPT-3, the latest and most powerful development in natural language processing technology. This state-of-the-art technology enables Full Picture to quickly and easily summarize large texts, analyze for bias and imbalanced reporting, assign ratings, and provide search keywords for further investigation. GPT-3 is a powerful artificial intelligence system capable of understanding and generating natural language. It is able to recognize key words, phrases, and topics, allowing it to accurately summarize any text into easy-to-understand bullet points.

Once Full Picture has summarized the text, it will analyze the text and provide a report on any biases, imbalanced reporting, and underrepresented points of view that it finds. It then assigns a general rating on how imbalanced the text is, which helps you quickly assess the quality and reliability of the text they are reading. After that, it provides you with additional keywords that can be used to perform Google searches to find more information to supplement the article.

In todayâ€™s world, it is essential to be able to recognize bias and imbalanced reporting. With the rise of fake news and the prevalence of misinformation, it is more important than ever to be able to identify when texts and articles are not presenting the full story. Bias and imbalanced reporting can lead to misinterpretations and false conclusions, which can have serious implications on our society. Being able to recognize and analyze bias helps us make informed decisions and form educated opinions based on facts, not false assumptions. 

GPT-3 s an incredibly powerful tool that can be used to quickly and accurately assess the accuracy and reliability of any text. Full Picture harnesses this power to make it easier for anyone to uncover the truth behind any text they come across. With GPT-3, Full Picture is able to provide you with the tools you need to make informed decisions and form educated opinions, making it easy to quickly and easily assess the credibility and accuracy of any text you come across. By providing summaries, analyses, ratings, and search keywords, it helps you uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting in the texts you are reading. This helps you stay informed and make educated decisions, rather than forming conclusions based on false information. It is a great tool for anyone who wants to be better informed and make sure they are basing their opinions on accurate information.

Full Picture is an invaluable tool for many different groups of people, such as:

* Journalists, political commentators, and students. Journalists can use it to uncover the truth behind any story they are covering, making sure that they are reporting facts accurately and without bias. Political commentators can use it to evaluate news stories and articles to ensure that they are forming accurate opinions. Students can use it to evaluate the articles and texts they read in their classes and better understand the information they are consuming. 

* Educators and researchers. Educators can use this extension to teach their students how to assess the accuracy and credibility of any text they encounter. Researchers can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting in the texts they are reviewing.

* Business owners, entrepreneurs, and investors. Business owners can use it to evaluate the accuracy of any news or articles related to their industry, so they can make informed decisions and plan accordingly. Entrepreneurs can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting in any texts they encounter, so they can make informed decisions when starting their business venture. Investors can use it to better understand the news and stories related to their investments, so they can make educated decisions and protect their investments. 

* Lawyers, judges, and legal professionals. Lawyers can use it to evaluate any texts they come across in their cases, so they can make accurate and informed decisions. Judges can use it to assess the accuracy of any texts related to court cases, so they can make informed decisions when ruling on cases. Legal professionals can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting in any texts related to their work, so they can better understand the facts and make informed decisions. 

* Activists and advocacy organizations. Activists can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting related to their cause, so they can make educated decisions and better fight for their cause. Advocacy organizations can use it to evaluate any texts related to their organization, so they can make informed decisions and better advocate for their cause. 

* Health care professionals, who can use it to evaluate any texts related to their field, so they can make informed decisions and stay up to date on the latest developments in their field. They can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting in any texts they encounter, so they can make accurate decisions and provide the best care to their patients.

* Scientists and researchers. They can use it to evaluate any texts related to their field, so they can make accurate and informed decisions. They can use it to uncover any omitted information and imbalanced reporting, so they can make informed decisions when conducting their research.

* Law enforcement and security professionals. They can use it to evaluate any texts related to their field, so they can make informed decisions and better protect the public. They can use it to uncover any omitted information or imbalanced reporting, so they can make informed decisions and better protect the public from crime and other potential threats.

Finally, Full Picture is beneficial to anyone who wants to stay informed and make educated decisions. It provides users with the tools they need to assess the accuracy and reliability of any text they come across, allowing them to form their own opinions and make informed decisions.

Full Picture also allows you to share your findings with friends and family. This helps spread accurate information and make sure that everyone is informed and making educated decisions. It is available for free and is fully compatible with the Chrome browser. This makes it accessible to anyone with an internet connection, ensuring that everyone can be informed and make educated decisions. It is a great tool for anyone who wants to stay up-to-date on current events and form their own opinions without being influenced by biased reporting.

GPT-3's natural language processing capabilities allow Full Picture to quickly and accurately understand the text it is analyzing. GPT-3's natural language processing capabilities make it an invaluable tool for Full Picture - not only does it make it possible to quickly and accurately analyze any text, it also makes it possible to provide users with the tools they need to stay informed and make educated decisions.

Overall, Full Picture is an extremely helpful tool for anyone who wants to be better informed. It is designed to make it easy to evaluate the accuracy of any text, article, or news item users come across. It quickly summarizes the text and provides ratings and search keywords to help users uncover the truth. It is user-friendly and designed to be used by anyone, regardless of their technical knowledge. With Full Picture, users can quickly and easily make informed decisions and form educated opinions.
